dct_description_sm: composto dal P. Maestro Coronelli ; per Sebastiano Foscarinia.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, islands off coast, cities and settlements along the coast, travel routes by sea, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of coats of arms throughout.
Decorative cartouche and pictorial vignette of an elephant, lion, and swan.
